庎字的基本解释

庎
jiè
放置食物等的搁板或架子。
独居。
濯洗用的流水器。

庎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiè］
［《集韻》居拜切，去怪，見。］
亦作“楐1”。
(1)用来搁置食物器具的木板或架子。
(2)濯洗用的流水器。
(3)通“匄”。恩赐，给予。

庎字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庎； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页343第30
【集韻】居拜切，音介。所以庋食器也。【六書故】庎，庋版，令足流水以受滌濯。今人設之於廚。【集韻】或作楐。

庎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
庎字的起名意思

暂无。

庎
Basic explanation of words
庎
jiè
Shelves or shelves for food, etc.
Live alone.
Water dispenser for washing.
庎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiè］
["Jiyun" Jubaiqie, go to blame, see. ]
Also known as "楐1".
(1) Wooden boards or shelves used to hold food utensils.
(2) Water dispenser for washing.
(3) Through "匄". Gift, give.
庎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　庎; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 343 30
[Jiyun] Jubaiqie, sound media. So Xu Shiqi also. [Six Books] The 庎, 庋 version, so that the feet can be washed away by running water. Today people set it in the kitchen. 【Ji Yun】Or make a chorus.
庎
